text: "Sorry" is a 2015 song by Canadian singer Justin Bieber and is the second single from his fourth studio album Purpose. It topped the single charts in Canada, Denmark, Ireland, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Portugal, Scotland, Slovakia, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, the United Kingdom and the United States. It went to the top 10 in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Norway and Switzerland. The music video has over 3.5 billion views on YouTube. title: Sorry (Justin Bieber song)
